title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook spaghetti until al dente.
While pasta cooks, fry the pancetta with garlic in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Pecorino Romano, and Parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Remove pan from heat, add pasta to pancetta, then pour egg mixture over it.
Toss quickly, adding pasta water little by little until creamy.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery and creamy tomato based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka spice mix for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry marinated chicken until charred and cooked through.
In a large pan, melt butter and saut√© onion until golden brown.
Add garlic and ginger paste, cook for 2 minutes until fragrant.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and add the grilled chicken pieces.
Simmer for another 10 minutes, season with salt, and garnish with cilantro.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: A simple and healthy breakfast with creamy avocado spread on crispy toasted bread.
steps: Toast the sourdough bread slices until golden and crispy.
Halve the avocado, remove the pit, and scoop flesh into a bowl.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper to your preferred texture.
Spread the mashed avocado generously over each toast slice.
Top with red pepper flakes, microgreens, and a poached egg if desired.
Serve immediately and enjoy.
